original_title: The Jungle Tale - "An Ordinary Life Until..."
overview: This is a proof of concept for children series.  A group of kids are raised in the heart of the jungle called Paranata, by wild animals that adopt and look after them. The jungle kids learn the valuable lessons and laws of the jungle. Overall, they learn that nature is the beauty of life to balance harmony. The kids manage to survive and adapt to the land of the wild. They love to stay in the jungle, but there are mysteries about menâ€™s destruction of nature.
title: The Jungle Tale - "An Ordinary Life Until..."
